attributes.action:
FREE KURDISTAN
UK government to support Kurdish independence.
attributes.additional_details:
They suffered throughout the history from these bad regimes and always dreamed and fought to have their own country.
They are the most effective group in fighting ISIS and the terrorism in the Middle East.
They are peaceful people and always wanted to live in peace, freedom and democratic country.
attributes.background:
After the First World War, Kurds have been divided into four countries, which are Turkey, Syria, Iraq and Iran.
With a population of an estimated 35 million, Kurds are the largest ethnic group without their own nation!
They genuinely deserve to have their own country and total independence.
